name: Beowulf Engine
short_description: Beowulf is a multipurpose 3D Game Engine where every thing should be interchangeable. (Like you want to use your own vector class...no problem.) There will be provided two Sub-Engines: OpenGL and DirectX. Also support for AGEIA PhysX is planned.
